description:
Xposed module that removes Direct Share suggestions from Android's Share Sheet

A simple Xposed module to remove Direct Share suggestions from Android's Share Sheet.

Direct Share shows a row of suggested contacts and conversations when sharing content. This module hides that row and blocks share target profiling.

Requirements:

  • Android 14 or higher
  • LSPosed framework

LSPosed scope:

  • com.android.intentresolver
  • com.google.android.as
